Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Ğd-ḥr, a priest, with a blue painted lappet-wig, a modelled face(worn) with a blue painted beard and crossed arms in relief holding a blue painted adze and the string of the seed-bag that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg section is inscribed with blue painted Hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the foot.
Condition: fair - cracked at foot level, glaze worn on face
